data.description: Allow random access reads of sequential file
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I wrote this module to provide a common interface for allowing
    random access reads from files, pipes, or memory. This module is
    used by Image::ExifTool and will be part of that distribution. You
    can download ExifTool from http://owl.phy.queensu.ca/~phil/exiftool/
    if you want to see the module.
